items.sentence: Once a bad habit is formed, it\'s hard to get rid of it.
Parents are responsible for their children\'s education.
I want you to tell Tom that you don\'t love him anymore.
I wasn\'t sure I really wanted to go to Boston with Tom.
There are a bunch of books on the table. Are they yours?
We saw guards coming toward us, so we hid in the bushes.
What makes you think Tom is still a high school student?
Tom crawled into bed and pulled the covers over himself.
Tom dated my mother before she got married to my father.
Tom decided it was up to him to make the final decision.
Tom decided the best thing was to let Mary go to Boston.
Tom decided to give up skateboarding after his accident.
Nobody would\'ve gotten hurt if we\'d been more careful.
Tom says that recess is the best part of the school day.
Tom shot Mary in the knee before he blew her brains out.
Let\'s go out and eat dinner together from time to time.
A capital letter is used at the beginning of a sentence.
If he had studied harder, he would have passed the exam.
It could be dangerous to do what Tom is asking us to do.
If something sounds too good to be true, it probably is.
It would be fun to see how things change over the years.
Tom asked Mary many questions that she couldn\'t answer.
Tom apologized for not doing what he was supposed to do.
Tom arrived at 2:30 and Mary arrived a short time later.
Tom asked Mary to stay, but she had to get back to work.
Tom asked Mary when the last time she had seen John was.
Tom is the only boy Mary knows who is afraid of rabbits.
Tom leaned down and kissed his daughter on the forehead.
Tom learned to accept the love his stepparents gave him.
Tom may not want to sing, but you should ask him anyway.
Tom couldn\'t bear the pain any more so he shot himself.
Tom couldn\'t bring himself to jump into the cold water.
Tom couldn\'t convince Mary that she had made a mistake.
Tom couldn\'t convince Mary to go to the dance with him.
I wanted a sports car, but my wife said we needed a van.
I was surprised when Tom told me Mary needed to do that.
Tom had his secretary make three copies of the contract.
Tom had no inkling as to why his boss wanted to see him.
Tom had to pawn the watch his grandfather had given him.
Tom had trouble peeling the apple with his pocket knife.
Tom has been teaching us French for the past four years.
Tom needs to be told that he\'s not required to do that.
Let\'s stay up all night and watch the sunrise together.
Let\'s stop and get something to eat before the concert.
Mary is one of the most beautiful girls I\'ve ever seen.
Don\'t forget to turn off the TV before you go to sleep.
Don\'t get me wrong. Tom is the best person for the job.
Even though I slept for twelve hours, I\'m still sleepy.
Do what Tom tells you to do and everything will be fine.
Do you have any idea how important your test grades are?
